vendors.name: Trene' Forbes Photography
vendors.description: Tyrell proposed to the love of his life, Mika, on a yacht on Valentine’s Day, and their wedding was just as romantic and spectacular. Guests were wowed by their outdoor ceremony, and equally amazed at their beautiful indoor reception complete with a custom oval dance floor, lush flowers in shades of ivory and blush, and a blinged-out, 4-tier wedding cake. However, Mika’s shares, “My best memory of my wedding would be when the fog came onto the floor for our first dance. It was Magical like we were the only ones in the room. I would love to relive that moment.” It is the sentimental moments that always make weddings special. See all of the lovely details from Mika and Tyrell’s nuptials captured by Trene’ Forbes Photography below.

vendors.name: An Elegant Luxury: Lovely Ballroom Wedding in Coral Gables
vendors.description: It was an average day, seemingly like any other, when Elena was pulled over in her car for an expired tag. Driving away with a warning, neither she nor the officer would have guessed they had just met the love of their lives. The wheels of fate were set in motion that day and a year later their paths would cross again, this time at a house party through Elena’s cousin. That evening the first pages of their love story were written, and so began their path towards together forever.

vendors.name: Reem Photography

vendors.name: Denise Lillie Engagements
vendors.description: Led by Denise Lillie O’Neal, Denise Lillie Engagements has a strong focus on personalized, detail-oriented service, ensuring that each wedding reflects the unique cultural traditions and personal tastes of the couple. Clients consistently praise the team for their professionalism, creativity, and ability to manage complex, multi-day events. The team is experienced in handling all aspects of Indian weddings, from pre-wedding ceremonies to the main event and receptions.
